meta.label: Send mails from a contacts dataset
meta.description:
This recipe accepts input from two types of sources:

##### 1. Single Contact Dataset (mandatory):
- Each row in this dataset represents a distinct contact along with associated information, including an email address.
- The plugin processes each row individually to send personalized emails to each recipient.
- Reference variables from this dataset using the format: `{{column_name}}`.

##### 2. Optional Attachments:
- These are additional datasets that can be attached directly to the emails, and they can be in CSV or Excel format.
- You can incorporate them into the email body as HTML tables using: `{{attachments.dataset_name.html_table}}`.
- For more customized inclusion of data attachments within the email body, use the following loop:
```
    {% for row in attachments.dataset_name.data %}
        {{ row.column_name }}
    {% endfor %}
```
The output dataset logs the status of the sent emails. Review this dataset after running the recipe to check the email send status.
